Message: Hi, I’m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
i need help with post conversion testing
Sure, I can help with post conversion testing! Could you please let me know which tracking platform you are using? This will help me provide more specific guidance.

Great! For post conversion testing with RedTrack, I recommend reviewing the relevant Knowledge Base articles from RedTrack for proper setup steps. If you have any specific questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask!

To set up a RedTrack Postback on NewsBreak, follow these steps:

1. Go to your NewsBreak ad account.
2. Navigate to the 'Event Management' section.
3. Click on ‘Create/test web event.’
4. Enter the event name and select your tracking type as ‘Postback’.
5. Choose 'RedTrack' as the 3rd party tracking service and select your conversion event.
6. Follow the instructions in our Ad Manager to successfully save your event.

For more detailed instructions, you can refer to this article: [How to set up a RedTrack Postback on NewsBreak](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/25515090832013-How-to-set-up-a-RedTrack-Postback-on-NewsBreak).

Let me know if you need further assistance!
